validation.format: Invalid string, should contain only letters, numbers, and ()_/&+%@#;,.: -? special characters
validation.minLength: Organization name must be at least 2 characters
validation.maxLength: Organization name must be at most 100 characters
validation.noLeadingSpace: Organization name cannot start with a space
validation.noTrailingSpace: Organization name cannot end with a space
validation.noConsecutiveSpaces: Organization name cannot contain consecutive spaces

organizationDescription.label: Organization description
organizationDescription.tooltip: The organization's legal name. It is the official name of the person or entity that owns a company. Must be the name used on the legal party's government forms and business paperwork.

validation.maxLength: Organization description must be 500 characters or less
validation.minLength: Organization description must be at least 10 characters
validation.noHtml: Organization description cannot contain HTML tags

validation.maxLength: DBA name must be 100 characters or less

validation.format: Email must be in a valid business email format
validation.maxLength: Email must be at most 100 characters
validation.noPersonal: Please use a business email address (no gmail.com, yahoo.com, etc.)

countryOfFormation.label: Country of formation
countryOfFormation.tooltip: Country code in ISO alpha-2 format

validation.exactlyTwoChars: Country code must be exactly 2 characters

validation.min: Year of formation cannot be before 1800
validation.max: Year of formation cannot be in the future
validation.invalid: Please enter a valid year between 1800 and current year

validation.maxLength: Address line must be 60 characters or less
validation.minLines: At least one address line is required
validation.firstLine: First line must not be a PO Box and must begin with a number

State name must be 30 characters or less
Postal code must be 10 characters or less

validation.exactlyTwoChars: Country code must be exactly 2 characters

validation.maxLength: First name must be at most 30 characters
Middle name must be at most 30 characters

validation.minLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters
validation.maxLength: Last name must be at most 30 characters

validation.minLength: Name suffix must be at least 1 character
validation.maxLength: Name suffix must be at most 5 characters
Job title description must be at most 50 characters

validation.minAddresses: At least one address is required

validation.minLength: Industry category must be at least 3 characters

validation.maxLength: Industry type must be 100 characters or less
validation.format: Industry type can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation
validation.minLength: Industry type must be at least 3 characters

validation.minIds: At least one organization ID is required
validation.uniqueTypes: Each organization ID type must be unique

ID value must be 100 characters or less

validation.maxLength: Issuer must be 500 characters or less

validation.format: Expiry date must be in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format

validation.maxYears: Expiry date must be less than 10 years in the future

validation.maxLength: Website URL must be 500 characters or less

validation.noIp: Website URL cannot be an IP address

validation.format: MCC must be empty or exactly 4 digits

title: Client Onboarding
initialStepDescription1: The information we request from you will help us complete setting up your account.
initialStepDescription2: Please review and update any information that needs confirmation; and provide any additional information requested.
initialStepNoOrganizationType: Please select your organization type to preview the information you will need to confirm or provide.
initialStepOrganizationTypeInformation: As a $t(organizationTypes.{{organizationType}}), you will need to confirm or provide the following information:

errorMessages.default: An error occurred while fetching client data. Please try again.
errorMessages.clientNotFound: Client not found. Please try again or contact support.
